message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $600000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $700000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I understand that you want to make a profit, but I'm not sure the product is worth $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $650000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $650000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $675000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not convinced that $675000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $620000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to negotiate a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $675000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $670000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to budge any further.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $670000. I'm willing to meet you at $610000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually agreeable price. If not, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to make a final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $610000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, which would be $672500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I've made a final offer of $620000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options. I'm willing to walk away from this deal if it's not mutually beneficial.
